special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit enchantment creature tokens.
II – Search your library for a land card that can produce {C}. Put it into your hand, then shuffle.
III – You gain 4 life.
